name: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
overview:
See, hear, feel and submerge yourself into the action of the long awaited hit movie The Lost World: Jurassic Park!
• The first ever Model 3 3D shooting game offering 1,000,000 polygons per second, full textured mapping and 60 frames per second!
• Intense mind-boggling graphics displayed on a 50" medium-resolution Mitsubishi monitor and awesome 4 speaker surround sound system hurls you right into the action.
• Two Power Bar Options... collect 3 standard power bars and increase your life or collect 1 special "S" power bar and you automatically increase your life.
• 14 Dinosaurs and 5 action-packed enticing stages guarantee longevity in gameplay.
• New 2 player teamwork rating screen is sure to capture added player-appeal.
